sentence.Network_en: Dendrobium, which has more than 1600 original species, is a genus of the Orchidaceae family.
sentence.Network_cn: 石斛属(Dendrobium)是兰科植物中较大的属之一,约有1600余原生种.

sentence.Network_en: Bilateral flowers evolved , e . g . those of the pea family ( Fabaceae ) and orchids ( Orchidaceae ).
sentence.Network_cn: 左右对称花类植物发生多样化进化, 如豆科植物 ( 豆科 ) 和兰科植物 ( 兰科 ).
